name: TimeFootball
description:
Created For Clima's Game Jam.

Purpose of the game is stop milliseconds at some specific times.

You have 90 seconds to finish match. 

0-100-101 => Goal

1-99  => Penalty

50 => VAR check (2 Players Mode)

1 Player Controller 

 Click the button to stop and start time.

2 Player Controller

First player controller = > To stop and start time press left shift.

Second player controller = > To stop and start time press right shift.
